name: Wild Wrangler
description:
Explore various untamed environments as a Wild Wrangler! Help locals who want a bespoke monster of their own and venture out to find materials that change monster's appearances. Puzzle out each monster's Trait Grid and make the monster of your dreams!

Intended to be played with a mouse and keyboard.

Wild Wrangler is a vertical slice of a monster-capture game with exploration, grid-based monster editing, and quests.
